comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Lovely and very interesting shot!  I love the old motorcycles with the drop handlebars.  Interestingly the front tyres are in very good condition either through lack of fuel so therefore they were not much used or they were stored up in a depot during the war.  Those young men in the background on the left appear to be wearing military style gaiters/leggings.  Great shot, thank you for posting!
